name: nate_dev_tool
description:
Nate's self-development tool for inspecting his own codebase, logs, and system health. Level 1 is READ-ONLY - perfect for investigating bugs, understanding code, checking system health, or exploring codebase structure.

Actions:
- read_file: Read source code (requires path)
- search_code: Search for patterns (requires pattern)
- read_logs: Read system/service logs
- check_health: Get system health metrics
- list_directory: List files in a directory

path.description: File or directory path (relative to substrate root, e.g., 'backend/core/consciousness_loop.py')

end_line.description: Ending line for read_file (-1 for end of file)

file_pattern.description: Glob pattern for files to search (e.g., '*.py')

context_lines.description: Number of context lines around search matches

lines.description: Number of log lines to return

filter_pattern.description: Regex pattern to filter log lines

since_minutes.description: Only show logs from the last N minutes
